Responsive Web Design

Homework

What is responsive?

Getting responsive right requires...

  • Deliberate planning and attention to how an experience is constructed.
  • Prototyping!
  • Qualitative & quantitative research. Testing with users & getting metrics on usage.

Get into code!

Avoid the waste of over-comping and solve problems in code when possible.

How does responsive work?

Media Queries aka breakpoints

Conditional rules for changing a view's appearance or functionality.

Try it on codepen bit.ly/20co3bg 

p{
  color: #222;
  font-size: 32px;
  font-weight: bold;
}

@media (min-width: 1200px){ 
  p{
    font-size: 64px;
  }
}
